system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.MHXQ6uBfaRCgUfgW]{Basic Offensive Form}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.XGxd5T4lqfPVTwF1]{Rapid Form Focus} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.4k8uVqjPvwmxogAK]{Precision Form Focus}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.tbBRjXDVRbf2ZsHH]{Intermediate Offensive Form}, and @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.vbOMM8Ep25gwiLuw]{Rapid Form Expertise} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.v8voUausr79B1bTE]{Precision Form Expertise}

Benefits

The character can throw their psiblade or plasblade, which has the same damage, a range of 40â€™, and is considered a Small thrown weapon when used in this manner. Also, when using a psiblade or plasblade, a character may increase the Combat Point cost of a standard melee attack by +1. If they do, they gain a +3 damage bonus for every +1 increase of Combat Point cost. Also, when using a psiblade to attack any object or armor that has plasma damage reduction, the damage given immediately goes into soak and the damage to soak is tripled, even if it does not breach the object or armors damage reduction

Special

As long as a character has Combat Points to spend during their turn, they are free to add to the cost to attack

Normal

Plasma damage that connects with Plasma damage reduction does not move to soak unless the damage is more than the damage reduction.
system.summary: Throw psiblade further, Spend CP for more damage, 3x damage to soak
